fields.description: Multiple services are down due to major network outage in our PHX1 data center
This is a live test from the database

fields.outage_notification_template:

<<issue_status_description>>

SITE:              <<issue_site>>

If you have any questions or concerns please address them to
<<source_email_address>>
----------------------------------------------------------------------
